verses.name: Exodus 32:20
verses.text: And he took the calf which they had made, and burnt it in the fire, and ground it to powder, and strawed it upon the water, and made the children of Israel drink of it.

verses.name: Exodus 32:21
verses.text: And Moses said unto Aaron, What did this people unto thee, that thou hast brought so great a sin upon them?

verses.name: Exodus 32:22
verses.text: And Aaron said, Let not the anger of my lord wax hot: thou knowest the people, that they are set on mischief.
